mdBlocks.parent: # 算術演算子
今回は、プログラム上で四則演算（足し算、引き算、掛け算、割り算）を行う方法を学びます。といっても、やり方は非常に単純です。次のプログラムを見てください。
書き方は数学での四則演算に非常に似ていますが、掛け算と割り算だけ記号が少し違うので注意してください。この記号出力は以下のようになります。

![%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%971.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/442ebb68-da46-4217-b2a5-40ca635f6432/%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%971.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466UTTWRKUH%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T110043Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIGd4THIuOgqIMHUcnEWkK1ok3FDgKIn7SzLrsBWdgzYnAiATSWSuYi4jdq2fXuuJyjTGcBhoQ3pnERqIeldMFkZPsCr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIM%2FHY9LR37acJhOzBrKtwDFVebXlfLIxRIgu5mjGgGAN8Ynxi2R8y5vRKiJOt1Kv%2BMbZSviBMJNRI0cixy%2FusiNaU7B2IsJJG06xAjBGgZtAGg9pGwrxVvTUSdAg9KtuL6KNJ6JpUQQBGaldQXxmlpPMssf3tjlfq%2FlwMSQ37TRoO%2B55vWIzivRnCEpsC%2Fyf%2BTk6jhodMR%2BBYBbudHCbq1OhOqFTOI01%2Bfqq14fvlGz%2B6EcrkDKAM8E0%2FyJipcZpR8tr%2FyIlOAUusENlQJsqjiTWUbHbaR8II1T2wGfO%2Fd%2F%2FmETY%2Fl8LqmwXaPobPZkAhr8YRS33w9Md1czXf29Qnu0CnCF9Za9qRGgxcw1VmevOGH7d9AEbD0KAASNowPo%2BsIMmY7SIrQqTjgZKfPZQy5cdtaouHsW9x6um29aBUPmnbWiT3YxmgviOVJYKkvQPIMTz0%2B2TS0qe1K1%2FDGlatmNO7nDt46vVzl77wAIXLk%2FPUM9giydbjsIVMDfbaI5NRP6YHD4FQMAYzSPZWse66NccHFAzPTJ2%2Bfz3RDPrtMvAqDFu1snE2GJN6txf416v7QMBU0pdkrQ%2FWM6jJE0hVQou8GYIz%2BCY0SxobnKwp9LLckHm11JYeJFnDNCmp%2BFNmhh%2BJjNNEcq86Qvdkw87DVvgY6pgFJzfEf24bhyDeS%2B4MJ9C%2BZdBYvV08XwIMwJZZJX5EVzSJgCfvLVkHkrTufUSUsJIM%2BUBrIKxMMMLr876UkYy0qewZchDcrL6FC%2Bak8FhBHbxjp%2BMMDdDn2q%2FRM0G5ZcstCuWUTpzCa9rvyzzGxbrqLvtNGEBHsDOV0gsowUZmqBdBSpeOjZWSGNfZxZBhs%2B678EVtSSiUDTpqIOuso6N2W3LdXeFUU&X-Amz-Signature=d10be399c71558c6d8b1f3efa30d964e6e1fee15633cae4a1b78822a5f1c9a75&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
また、この演算は、変数同士でも同様に行うことができます。以下のプログラムは`v1`と`v2`という二つの変数に対して四則演算を施しています。

```python
v1 = 10
v2 = 5
a = v1 + v2  #足し算
b = v1 - v2  #引き算
c = v1 * v2  #掛け算
d = v1 / v2  #割り算
print("v1 + v2 =", a)
print("v1 - v2 =", b)
print("v1 * v2 =", c)
print("v1 / v2 =", d)
```

![%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%972.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/363c5564-51c1-4970-85c2-90196ee666e1/%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%972.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466UTTWRKUH%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T110043Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIGd4THIuOgqIMHUcnEWkK1ok3FDgKIn7SzLrsBWdgzYnAiATSWSuYi4jdq2fXuuJyjTGcBhoQ3pnERqIeldMFkZPsCr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIM%2FHY9LR37acJhOzBrKtwDFVebXlfLIxRIgu5mjGgGAN8Ynxi2R8y5vRKiJOt1Kv%2BMbZSviBMJNRI0cixy%2FusiNaU7B2IsJJG06xAjBGgZtAGg9pGwrxVvTUSdAg9KtuL6KNJ6JpUQQBGaldQXxmlpPMssf3tjlfq%2FlwMSQ37TRoO%2B55vWIzivRnCEpsC%2Fyf%2BTk6jhodMR%2BBYBbudHCbq1OhOqFTOI01%2Bfqq14fvlGz%2B6EcrkDKAM8E0%2FyJipcZpR8tr%2FyIlOAUusENlQJsqjiTWUbHbaR8II1T2wGfO%2Fd%2F%2FmETY%2Fl8LqmwXaPobPZkAhr8YRS33w9Md1czXf29Qnu0CnCF9Za9qRGgxcw1VmevOGH7d9AEbD0KAASNowPo%2BsIMmY7SIrQqTjgZKfPZQy5cdtaouHsW9x6um29aBUPmnbWiT3YxmgviOVJYKkvQPIMTz0%2B2TS0qe1K1%2FDGlatmNO7nDt46vVzl77wAIXLk%2FPUM9giydbjsIVMDfbaI5NRP6YHD4FQMAYzSPZWse66NccHFAzPTJ2%2Bfz3RDPrtMvAqDFu1snE2GJN6txf416v7QMBU0pdkrQ%2FWM6jJE0hVQou8GYIz%2BCY0SxobnKwp9LLckHm11JYeJFnDNCmp%2BFNmhh%2BJjNNEcq86Qvdkw87DVvgY6pgFJzfEf24bhyDeS%2B4MJ9C%2BZdBYvV08XwIMwJZZJX5EVzSJgCfvLVkHkrTufUSUsJIM%2BUBrIKxMMMLr876UkYy0qewZchDcrL6FC%2Bak8FhBHbxjp%2BMMDdDn2q%2FRM0G5ZcstCuWUTpzCa9rvyzzGxbrqLvtNGEBHsDOV0gsowUZmqBdBSpeOjZWSGNfZxZBhs%2B678EVtSSiUDTpqIOuso6N2W3LdXeFUU&X-Amz-Signature=f7938471ebd7e274f4e04aec033c3e6cf673261754a28c9bdafd377aeef9e169&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
加えて、Pythonでは次のように割り算のあまりや累乗、小数点以下の切り捨て割り算などを計算することができます。

```python
v1 = 5
v2 = 2
a = v1 % v2     #割り算のあまり
b = v1 ** v2    #累乗
c = v1 // v2    #切り捨ての割り算
print("v1 % v2 =", a)
print("v1 ** v2 =", b)
print("v1 // v2 =", c)
```

![%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%973.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/d5814556-dde2-4767-910d-70eb7e81a320/%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%973.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466UTTWRKUH%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T110043Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIGd4THIuOgqIMHUcnEWkK1ok3FDgKIn7SzLrsBWdgzYnAiATSWSuYi4jdq2fXuuJyjTGcBhoQ3pnERqIeldMFkZPsCr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIM%2FHY9LR37acJhOzBrKtwDFVebXlfLIxRIgu5mjGgGAN8Ynxi2R8y5vRKiJOt1Kv%2BMbZSviBMJNRI0cixy%2FusiNaU7B2IsJJG06xAjBGgZtAGg9pGwrxVvTUSdAg9KtuL6KNJ6JpUQQBGaldQXxmlpPMssf3tjlfq%2FlwMSQ37TRoO%2B55vWIzivRnCEpsC%2Fyf%2BTk6jhodMR%2BBYBbudHCbq1OhOqFTOI01%2Bfqq14fvlGz%2B6EcrkDKAM8E0%2FyJipcZpR8tr%2FyIlOAUusENlQJsqjiTWUbHbaR8II1T2wGfO%2Fd%2F%2FmETY%2Fl8LqmwXaPobPZkAhr8YRS33w9Md1czXf29Qnu0CnCF9Za9qRGgxcw1VmevOGH7d9AEbD0KAASNowPo%2BsIMmY7SIrQqTjgZKfPZQy5cdtaouHsW9x6um29aBUPmnbWiT3YxmgviOVJYKkvQPIMTz0%2B2TS0qe1K1%2FDGlatmNO7nDt46vVzl77wAIXLk%2FPUM9giydbjsIVMDfbaI5NRP6YHD4FQMAYzSPZWse66NccHFAzPTJ2%2Bfz3RDPrtMvAqDFu1snE2GJN6txf416v7QMBU0pdkrQ%2FWM6jJE0hVQou8GYIz%2BCY0SxobnKwp9LLckHm11JYeJFnDNCmp%2BFNmhh%2BJjNNEcq86Qvdkw87DVvgY6pgFJzfEf24bhyDeS%2B4MJ9C%2BZdBYvV08XwIMwJZZJX5EVzSJgCfvLVkHkrTufUSUsJIM%2BUBrIKxMMMLr876UkYy0qewZchDcrL6FC%2Bak8FhBHbxjp%2BMMDdDn2q%2FRM0G5ZcstCuWUTpzCa9rvyzzGxbrqLvtNGEBHsDOV0gsowUZmqBdBSpeOjZWSGNfZxZBhs%2B678EVtSSiUDTpqIOuso6N2W3LdXeFUU&X-Amz-Signature=616b433668da4c23b81b24c1f8533aaccbc63850ae1c296f4d1589657a8fbe02&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
これらの `+  -  *  /  %  //` をあわせて、**算術演算子**と呼びます。以下の表に各算術演算子と処理内容を示します。

| 算術演算子 | 処理内容   |
| ----- | ------ |
| +     | 足し算    |
| -     | 引き算    |
| *     | 掛け算    |
| /     | 割り算    |
| %     | あまり    |
| **    | 累乗     |
| //    | 切り捨て除算 |
もちろん、複数の算術演算子を用いて複雑な計算を行うこともできます。その際には数学での計算と同じように掛け算と割り算が優先されますし、`()`で囲って計算順序を指定することもできます。また、`a`や`b`などの変数を介さずとも、計算式の答えをprint関数で直接出力することもできます。

```python
print("上底4, 下底6, 高さ3の台形の面積", (4 + 6) * 3 / 2)
print("半径5の球の表面積", 4 * 3.14 * (5 ** 2))    #4πr^2
```

![%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%974.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/b90c7872-7053-4d42-934e-d4d3b0d02f11/%E5%9B%9B%E5%89%87%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%974.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466UTTWRKUH%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T110043Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIGd4THIuOgqIMHUcnEWkK1ok3FDgKIn7SzLrsBWdgzYnAiATSWSuYi4jdq2fXuuJyjTGcBhoQ3pnERqIeldMFkZPsCr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIM%2FHY9LR37acJhOzBrKtwDFVebXlfLIxRIgu5mjGgGAN8Ynxi2R8y5vRKiJOt1Kv%2BMbZSviBMJNRI0cixy%2FusiNaU7B2IsJJG06xAjBGgZtAGg9pGwrxVvTUSdAg9KtuL6KNJ6JpUQQBGaldQXxmlpPMssf3tjlfq%2FlwMSQ37TRoO%2B55vWIzivRnCEpsC%2Fyf%2BTk6jhodMR%2BBYBbudHCbq1OhOqFTOI01%2Bfqq14fvlGz%2B6EcrkDKAM8E0%2FyJipcZpR8tr%2FyIlOAUusENlQJsqjiTWUbHbaR8II1T2wGfO%2Fd%2F%2FmETY%2Fl8LqmwXaPobPZkAhr8YRS33w9Md1czXf29Qnu0CnCF9Za9qRGgxcw1VmevOGH7d9AEbD0KAASNowPo%2BsIMmY7SIrQqTjgZKfPZQy5cdtaouHsW9x6um29aBUPmnbWiT3YxmgviOVJYKkvQPIMTz0%2B2TS0qe1K1%2FDGlatmNO7nDt46vVzl77wAIXLk%2FPUM9giydbjsIVMDfbaI5NRP6YHD4FQMAYzSPZWse66NccHFAzPTJ2%2Bfz3RDPrtMvAqDFu1snE2GJN6txf416v7QMBU0pdkrQ%2FWM6jJE0hVQou8GYIz%2BCY0SxobnKwp9LLckHm11JYeJFnDNCmp%2BFNmhh%2BJjNNEcq86Qvdkw87DVvgY6pgFJzfEf24bhyDeS%2B4MJ9C%2BZdBYvV08XwIMwJZZJX5EVzSJgCfvLVkHkrTufUSUsJIM%2BUBrIKxMMMLr876UkYy0qewZchDcrL6FC%2Bak8FhBHbxjp%2BMMDdDn2q%2FRM0G5ZcstCuWUTpzCa9rvyzzGxbrqLvtNGEBHsDOV0gsowUZmqBdBSpeOjZWSGNfZxZBhs%2B678EVtSSiUDTpqIOuso6N2W3LdXeFUU&X-Amz-Signature=bd7217bb29b572d3b08948903e98c5d4fad5479476644e2b10d363e752a4fddd&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
# 計算をするときの注意点
変数を用いて計算をするとき、その変数の**型**に注意しておかなければ、エラーや意図しない動作を引き起こす可能性があります。例えば、次のプログラムを見てください。

```python
a = 10
b = "5"
c = a + b
print(c)
```
`a`には整数の10が、`b`には**文字列として**5が格納されています。そのため、3行目の計算では数字と文字を足す計算式となっています。これを実行してみると…

![%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%97%E3%81%AE%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F.jpg](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/b76772e5-ec9c-41fa-a4f9-a5cb1fc7403d/%E6%BC%94%E7%AE%97%E3%81%AE%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466UTTWRKUH%2F20250315%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250315T110043Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjELv%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJGMEQCIGd4THIuOgqIMHUcnEWkK1ok3FDgKIn7SzLrsBWdgzYnAiATSWSuYi4jdq2fXuuJyjTGcBhoQ3pnERqIeldMFkZPsCr%2FAwgUEAAaDDYzNzQyMzE4MzgwNSIM%2FHY9LR37acJhOzBrKtwDFVebXlfLIxRIgu5mjGgGAN8Ynxi2R8y5vRKiJOt1Kv%2BMbZSviBMJNRI0cixy%2FusiNaU7B2IsJJG06xAjBGgZtAGg9pGwrxVvTUSdAg9KtuL6KNJ6JpUQQBGaldQXxmlpPMssf3tjlfq%2FlwMSQ37TRoO%2B55vWIzivRnCEpsC%2Fyf%2BTk6jhodMR%2BBYBbudHCbq1OhOqFTOI01%2Bfqq14fvlGz%2B6EcrkDKAM8E0%2FyJipcZpR8tr%2FyIlOAUusENlQJsqjiTWUbHbaR8II1T2wGfO%2Fd%2F%2FmETY%2Fl8LqmwXaPobPZkAhr8YRS33w9Md1czXf29Qnu0CnCF9Za9qRGgxcw1VmevOGH7d9AEbD0KAASNowPo%2BsIMmY7SIrQqTjgZKfPZQy5cdtaouHsW9x6um29aBUPmnbWiT3YxmgviOVJYKkvQPIMTz0%2B2TS0qe1K1%2FDGlatmNO7nDt46vVzl77wAIXLk%2FPUM9giydbjsIVMDfbaI5NRP6YHD4FQMAYzSPZWse66NccHFAzPTJ2%2Bfz3RDPrtMvAqDFu1snE2GJN6txf416v7QMBU0pdkrQ%2FWM6jJE0hVQou8GYIz%2BCY0SxobnKwp9LLckHm11JYeJFnDNCmp%2BFNmhh%2BJjNNEcq86Qvdkw87DVvgY6pgFJzfEf24bhyDeS%2B4MJ9C%2BZdBYvV08XwIMwJZZJX5EVzSJgCfvLVkHkrTufUSUsJIM%2BUBrIKxMMMLr876UkYy0qewZchDcrL6FC%2Bak8FhBHbxjp%2BMMDdDn2q%2FRM0G5ZcstCuWUTpzCa9rvyzzGxbrqLvtNGEBHsDOV0gsowUZmqBdBSpeOjZWSGNfZxZBhs%2B678EVtSSiUDTpqIOuso6N2W3LdXeFUU&X-Amz-Signature=e6f5e7c879201c0a1c2256905d91c5e2b6fecdecf3a1062e40280ac804e61636&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
赤色でエラーが出てしまい、実行ができませんでした。簡単に日本語訳すると「**int型（整数型）とstr型（文字列型）の足し算はサポートされてないやで**」という感じです。当たり前といえば当たり前ですが、このようなミスが規模の大きいプログラムではバグを生み出したりするのです…
{"icon":{"type":"emoji","emoji":"☝"},"color":"gray_background","parent":"> ☝ プログラミングをするときは、常に変数の型を意識しよう！"}
